table.name: document_set
table.description: The table holds document set details.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_SET_GID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document set.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_SET_XID
columns.description: The unique external identifier for the document set.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description about the document set.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_SET_NAME
columns.description: The name of the document set.

columns.name: OWNER_DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the owner data query type of the document set.

columns.name: REPLY_TO_INV_PARTY_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The qualifier to identify the involved party contact of the object specified by the document set that will be used as reply-to for email notifications.

columns.name: REPLY_TO_CONTACT_GID
columns.description: The reply-to contact for email notification. This is not retrieved from the object and will be used for all of the objects to which this document set is assigned.

columns.name: ZIP_DOCUMENTS
columns.description: Indicates whether the documents are to be compressed to a zip file or sent as individual documents in the email.

columns.name: SEND_PARTIAL_DOC_TYPES
columns.description: Indicates whether to send partial document types of the document set or to send all the document types.
